name: Cherry Coffee Cake
author: St. Augustine School Cafeteria
instructions: Sift 2 cups of flour and baking powder together. Cut in butter. Beat egg and milk together. Add to flour mixture, mix well. Pour into 15 x 10 inch pan that has been greased and floured. Cover with cherry filling. For topping, sift together 1 cup of flour and 1 cut of sugar. Cut in butter. Sprinkle over pie filling. Bake at 350Â° for 30 to 35 minutes.
